markdownRemark.html: <i></i>   <i></i>   <i></i> -13<p><img src="https://relationshipgoals.me/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/c-users-mahad-downloads-18-12-3510-jpg.jpeg"/></p> <img src="https://relationshipgoals.me/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/word-image-729.jpeg"/>Shutterstock <p>Zodiac signs are like a gateway into an individual’s soul and personality revealing their deepest most hidden traits that even they are not aware of. Being born under a particular sun sign does impact the way certain qualities develop in an individual. Some of us are really gifted with a sense of feeling out a scenario before it actually happens.</p> <p>Having a strong intuition and on top of that equally strong conviction that this is how things will pan out eventually makes some individuals stand out. Most often we might have that feeling or that sensation of just ‘knowing’ but more often than not we ignore our gut feelings.</p> <p>It is natural to doubt your instincts what with the external noise and influences anyone might end up ‘going with the flow’ rather than listening to that tiny voice in their head.</p> <p>There are certain sun signs which are way more connected and grounded to their environs than others giving them a slight advantage to see the larger picture. This enables them to have a higher intuition than others. Find out if your zodiac sign made the list!</p> <h2>1. Pisces</h2> <img src="https://relationshipgoals.me/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/word-image-730.jpeg"/>Shutterstock <p>The sun sign is often associated with being deeply spiritual. However for that spirituality to thrive they need to first acquire inner peace. Fish likes serenity and calm to see through their obstacles and overcome them. Pisces people have a tendency to correlate the events of past and present to indicate most possible outcome.</p> <p>They also are called natural dreamers where they might learn about an imminent event from occurring through their dreams.</p> <p>It is almost very easy to know what the other person maybe thinking and they will easily finish their sentences for them. It may be has got something to do with their open mindedness and their habit of following their heart in any situation. Since being intuitive stems from the heart, they always rely on their heart more than anything else.</p>     <h2>2. Scorpio</h2> <img src="https://relationshipgoals.me/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/word-image-731.jpeg"/>Shutterstock <p>Being very thoughtful and always contemplating and reflecting on things, Scorpio is another sign you would do well to listen to if they are about something happening in the near future. It is as though they have some kind of spiritual connection with people and the environment.</p> <p>This connection is more sensitive than the physical one and they experience these interactions more deeply allowing them to see those finer details which others may miss.</p> <p>Although they might have stronger intuition but they mostly disregard it since they are either too emotionally involved or their natural affinity with risk taking leads them to ignore their gut feeling. Predicting small stuff like someone going to cut you off at the traffic lights still comes naturally to you.</p> <p>It may be has something to do with their ability to get easily distracted. The noise, interruptions and the crowd sometimes take away your ability to reflect and connect on that level. You might meditate and escape from all this noise to a more peaceful quiet time to rediscover your psychic qualities.</p> <h2>3. Sagittarius</h2> <img src="https://relationshipgoals.me/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/word-image-732.jpeg"/>Shutterstock <p>They have the ability and the required intellectuality in order to see the situation and arrive at a perfect conclusion but this requires inner focus. This sun sign is naturally disposed towards having spontaneity and adventurous spirit often ignoring the clear signs their inner selves is giving them. If they only take their time and think over the matter at hand they will make the most accurate judgment.</p> <p>Sometimes they might just sleep over the issue and wake up clear and convinced of how to go about it. However due to their nature they always throw caution to the wind and make decisions on the go.</p> <p>If they can only work on their inner selves and be more grounded rather than be distracted by the external influences they might be able to see things more clearly. They will be able to make all the right moves only if they could refine their thought process.</p>     <p>It is often hard and not that easy for these individuals but once they have acquired the ability to in tune their mind and heart with their surroundings you will not come across a more intuitive person other than them.</p>   <i></i>
